item.title: Pete Hegseth Is a Walking Dead Nominee
item.description: The debate over his suitability to run the Pentagon has just begun.

item.title: The National Institutes of Health Needs an Overhaul
item.description: The agency is driven by activity, not results, and wastes money on pointless and counterproductive projects and DEI initiatives.

item.title: A Catholic Art Tour de Force
item.description: In her books, Elizabeth Lev takes us on a journey to the heart of the faith and its inextricable link to art.

item.title: The Rachel Levine Administration
item.description: Joe Biden is spending the final weeks of his presidency desperately trying to forge a positive legacy. But one of his appointees may have already help...

item.title: Dispatches from the House Party
item.description: Playing the host can enrich our lives. We are social animals, after all.
